'''''SEVEN 19''''' is the nineteenth volume of the [[Marion E. Wade Center]]'s annual journal ''[[SEVEN]]'', published in [[2002]].<ref name="jstor" />

*"Intellectual Tyranny: A Rebellion?"
**By: Barbara Reynolds

**By: [[John Ryan|J.S. Ryan]]
*"Browsing the Glome Library"
**By: Doris T. Myers
